information.name: informasjon
information.description: Brukes til å vise forskjellig informasjon.
information.options.bot.name: bot
information.options.bot.strings.whoAmI.b: Jeg heter **{username}**, en applikasjon opprettet for å tilby språk-læring Discord samfunn høyeste kvalitet egenskaper, for eksempel:
information.options.bot.strings.howWasIM: Jeg er drevet av [TypeScript]({language_link}) kjører innen [Deno]({runtime_link}). Jeg samhandler med [Discord's API]({api_link}) med hjelp av [Discordeno]({library_link}) API-bibliotek.
information.options.bot.strings.howToAdd: Hvordan kan du legge meg til serveren din?

Det er ikke mulig å legge meg til i ditt samfunn på dette tidspunktet. Jeg ble laget for å behandle noen få språklæringssamfunn, for eksempel [Learn Romanian] ({learn_romanian_link}) og [Learn Armenian] ({learn_armenian_link}).
information.options.bot.strings.amIOpenS: Nei, jeg er ikke åpen kildekode. Det er også ingen planer om å frigi kodebasen min til offentligheten.
information.options.server.name: server
information.options.server.strings.overs: Denne serveren er oversett av en kolleksjon av {role_mention}er.
game.name: spill
game.description: Velg riktig ord av fire som passer i blanketten.
game.strings.noSentencesAvailable.title: Ingen setninger tilgjengelig
game.strings.noSentencesAvailable.descri: Det er ingen setninger tilgjengelig på det forespurte språket.
resources.name: ressurser
resources.description: Omdirigerer til repositoriet til ressursen for å lære språket.
resources.strings.resourcesStoredHere: Klikk for ressurser for å lære {language}

translate.description: Oversetter en tekst fra kildespråket til målspråket.

translate.options.to.name: til
translate.options.text.name: tekst
translate.strings.mustBeDifferentFromSou: Målspråket er kanskje ikke det samme som kildespråket.
Målspråket er kanskje ikke det samme som kildespråket.
translate.strings.failed.title: Kan ikke oversette tekst
translate.strings.failed.description: Feilet ved oversettelse av gitt tekst.
translate.strings.invalid.title: Ugyldig språk
translate.strings.invalid.both: Både kildespråket og målspråket er ugyldige.
word.name: ord
word.description: Viser informasjon om et bestemt ord.
word.options.word.name: ord
word.options.verbose.name: ordrik
word.options.verbose.description: Hvis satt til sann, vil mer (muligens unødvendig) informasjon vises.
word.strings.noDictionaryAdapters.title: Ingen ordbøker tilgjengelig for språk
word.strings.noDictionaryAdapters.descri: Det finnes ingen ordbøker i det forespurte språket.
word.strings.noResults.title: Ingen resultater
word.strings.noResults.description: Det er ingen resultater for ordet '{word}'.
word.strings.definitionsOmitted: Utelatt {number | pluralise, one:"definisjon", two:"definisjoner"}. For å vise flere resultater, aktiver `{flag}`-flagget.
list.name: list
list.description: Allows the viewing of various information about users.
list.options.warnings.name: advarsler
list.options.warnings.description: Lists the warnings issued to a user.
list.options.warnings.strings.failed.des: Failed to show warnings for the given user.
list.options.warnings.strings.noActiveWa: This user does not have any active warnings.
pardon.name: pardon
pardon.description: Removes one of the warnings previously given to a user.
pardon.options.warning.name: advarsler
pardon.strings.invalidWarning: The warning you specified is invalid.
pardon.strings.pardoned: User {user_mention} has been pardoned from their warning for: {reason}
policy.name: policy
report.name: report
report.description: Allows the user to create a user report.
report.strings.reportSubmitted.body: Your report has been submitted. The report will be reviewed by the server staff, but you will not be notified directly about the outcome of a particular report.
report.strings.specifiedUsersIncorrectly: You have incorrectly specified which users to report.
report.strings.toIdentifyUser: To identify a user, include their ID or tag. User identifiers must be separated using a comma.
report.strings.specifiedUserMoreThanOnce: You have specified the same user more than once.
report.strings.makeSureOnlyMentionedOnce: Before attempting to submit the report again, make sure each user is only mentioned once in the report.
report.strings.cannotSubmitReportAgainst: You cannot submit a report against yourself.
report.strings.areYouSureToStopSubmittin: Are you sure you want to stop submitting the report?
report.strings.waitBeforeReporting: You have already made a few reports recently. Before submitting another report, you should wait some time.
report.strings.specifiedTooManyUsers: You have tried to report too many users at once. You can only report up to {number | pluralise, one:"user", two:"users"} at once.
rule.name: regel
rule.options.rule.name: regel
timeout.name: timeout
timeout.options.set.name: set
timeout.options.set.description: Times a user out, making them unable to interact on the server.
timeout.options.clear.name: clear
timeout.strings.durationCannotBeLessThan: The timeout must last at least a minute.
timeout.strings.durationMustBeShorterTha: The duration must not be longer than a week.
timeout.strings.timedOut: User {user_mention} has been timed out. The timeout will expire {relative_timestamp}.
timeout.strings.notTimedOut: The specified user is not currently timed out.
timeout.strings.timeoutCleared: User {user_mention} is no longer timed out.
warn.name: warn
warn.strings.warned: User {user_mention} has been warned. They now have {number | pluralise, one:"warning", two:"warnings"}.
warn.strings.passedLimit: {user_mention} has *surpassed* the warning limit ({limit}), having just received warning no. {number}, and has subsequently been timed out for the period of a day.
music.name: musikk
music.description: Allows the user to manage music playback in a voice channel.
music.options.history.name: logg
music.options.history.description: Displays a list of previously played songs.
music.options.now.name: akkurat nå
music.options.now.strings.noSongPlaying: There is no song to display the details of.
music.options.now.strings.noCollectionPl: There is no song collection to show the details of.
music.options.now.strings.requestInforma: Try requesting information about the current song instead.
music.options.now.strings.title: Tittel
music.options.pause.name: pause
music.options.pause.description: Pauses the currently playing song or song collection.
music.options.pause.strings.noSongToPaus: There is no song to pause.
music.options.play.name: spill
music.options.play.description: Allows the user to play music in a voice channel.
music.options.play.options.file.name: file
music.options.play.options.youtube.name: youtube
music.options.play.strings.selectSong.bo: Select a song or song collection from the choices below.
music.options.play.strings.tryDifferentQ: You could try an alternative search, or request a different song.
music.options.play.strings.alreadyPlayin: The bot is playing music in another voice channel.
music.options.play.strings.queueIsFull: The queue is full. Try removing a song from the song queue, skip the current song to advance the queue immediately, or wait until the current song finishes playing.
music.options.play.strings.queued.body: Your listing, **{title}**, has been added to the queue.
music.options.queue.name: queue
music.options.queue.description: Displays a list of queued song listings.
music.options.remove.name: remove
music.options.remove.description: Removes a song listing from the queue.
music.options.remove.strings.noListingTo: There are no songs in the queue.
music.options.remove.strings.selectSongT: Select a song or song collection to remove from the choices below.
music.options.remove.strings.failedToRem: Failed to remove the selected song.
music.options.remove.strings.removed.bod: The song **{title}** has been removed by {user_mention}.
music.options.replay.name: replay
music.options.replay.description: Begins playing the currently playing song from the start.
music.options.replay.strings.noSongToRep: There is no song to replay.
music.options.replay.strings.noSongColle: There is no song collection to replay.
music.options.replay.strings.tryReplayin: Try replaying the current song instead.
music.options.resume.name: resume
music.options.resume.description: Unpauses the currently playing song if it is paused.
music.options.resume.strings.noSongToRes: There is no song to resume the playing of.
music.options.resume.strings.notCurrentl: The current song is not paused.
music.options.skip-to.name: skip-to
music.options.skip-to.description: Skips to a given point in the currently playing song.
Playback has skipped to the specified timestamp.
music.options.skip.name: skip
music.options.skip.strings.noSongToSkip: There is no song to skip.
music.options.skip.strings.noSongCollect: There is no song collection to skip.
music.options.skip.strings.trySkippingSo: Try skipping the current song instead.
music.options.skip.strings.skippedSongCo: The song collection has been skipped.
music.options.stop.name: stop
music.options.stop.description: Stops the current listening session, clearing the queue and song history.
music.options.stop.strings.stopped.body: The listening session has been stopped, and the song queue and history have been cleared.
music.options.unskip.name: unskip
music.options.unskip.description: Brings back the last played song.
music.options.unskip.strings.nowhereToUn: There are no song listings to bring back.
music.options.unskip.strings.noSongColle: There is no song collection playing to skip.
music.options.unskip.strings.tryUnskippi: Try bringing back the current song instead.
music.options.unskip.strings.cannotUnski: The last played song listing cannot be brought back because the song queue is already full.
music.options.unskip.strings.unskipped.b: The last played song listing has been brought back.
music.options.volume.name: volume
music.options.volume.description: Allows the user to manage the volume of music playback.
music.options.volume.options.set.name: set
music.options.volume.options.set.strings: Song volume may not be negative, and it may not be higher than {volume}%.
The volume has been set to {volume}%.
music.strings.notPlayingMusic: The bot is currently not playing music.
music.strings.mustBeInVoiceChannelToMani: To manipulate music, you must be in a voice channel.
music.strings.mustBeInVoiceChannelToChec: To check playback-related information, you must be in a voice channel.
music.strings.tooManySkipArguments: You may not skip __by__ a number of songs and skip __to__ a certain song in the same query.
music.strings.mustBeGreaterThanZero: The skip argument must be greater than zero.
music.strings.allDone.body: Can I go home for today?
music.strings.couldNotLoadTrack.body: The track, **{title}**, could not be loaded.
music.strings.cannotManipulateIfHadBeenA: You cannot manipulate the playback of music that you were not present to see get queued.
suggestion.name: suggestion
suggestion.description: Allows the user to make a suggestion for the community.
suggestion.strings.suggestionSent.body: Your suggestion has been passed over to the server staff.
suggestion.strings.areYouSureToStopSubmi: Are you sure you want to stop submitting the suggestion?
suggestion.strings.waitBeforeSuggesting: You have already made a few suggestions recently. You should wait a little before making another suggestion.
praise.name: praise
praise.description: Praises a user for their contribution.
praise.options.comment.name: comment
praise.options.comment.description: A comment to attach to the praise.
praise.strings.waitBeforePraising: You have already praised a user recently. You must wait before praising somebody again.
praise.strings.praised: Unless {user_mention} has their DMs closed, they have just been notified that you have praised them.

profile.options.roles.strings.reachedLim: You have reached the limit of roles you can assign from within the '{category}' category.
profile.options.roles.strings.unassignOn: To choose a new role, unassign one of your existing roles.
